name: UISearchResultsUpdating
desc: A set of methods that let you update search results based on information the user enters into the search bar.

items.name: func updateSearchResults(for: UISearchController)
items.desc: Asks the object to update the search results for a specified controller.

items.name: func updateSearchResults(for: UISearchController, selecting: UISearchSuggestion)
items.desc: Asks the object to update the search results for a specified controller after the user selects a search suggestion.
